sentences.en: At first we chatted agree-ably about his trips to London and Paris.
sentences.cn: 一开始，我们愉快地聊起他的伦敦和巴黎之行。

sentences.en: Bordeaux is on the main Paris-Madrid line so there are frequent trains.
sentences.cn: 波尔多位于巴黎到马德里的铁路主干线上，来往列车频繁。

sentences.en: Father's flat in Paris wasn't nearly as grand as this.
sentences.cn: 爸爸在法国的公寓远不如这处宽敞。

sentences.en: Gerome tried to talk her into taking an apartment in Paris.
sentences.cn: 杰罗姆试图说服她在巴黎买一套公寓。

sentences.en: I just wanted to explore Paris, read Sartre, listen to Sidney Bechet.
sentences.cn: 我就想逛逛巴黎，读读萨特的作品，听听悉尼·贝谢的音乐。

sentences.en: I know nothing about him except that he is from Paris.
sentences.cn: 我只知道他是来自巴黎，其他的就不知道了。

sentences.en: I'm going to go on an exchange visit to Paris.
sentences.cn: 我将到巴黎交流参观。

sentences.en: Nick Sullivan previews this season's collections from Paris and Milan.
sentences.cn: 尼克·沙利文对这一季来自巴黎和米兰的时装系列作了预评。

sentences.en: Normally, the transportation system in Paris carries 950,000 passengers a day.
sentences.cn: 正常情况下，巴黎的交通系统每天运送95万乘客。

sentences.en: On the flight from Paris to Toulon, Mechiche fell prey to panic.
sentences.cn: 在从巴黎飞往土伦的航班上，梅希什惊慌失措。

sentences.en: She was privately educated at schools in Ireland and Paris.
sentences.cn: 她在爱尔兰和巴黎的学校接受过私立教育。

sentences.en: The French crowds pour like lemmings down the motorway to Paris.
sentences.cn: 一群群法国人像旅鼠一样涌上通往巴黎的高速公路。

sentences.en: The last stop in Mr Cook's lengthy tour was Paris.
sentences.cn: 库克先生漫长旅程中的最后一站是巴黎。

sentences.en: The murderer was traced to Paris.
sentences.cn: 那个凶手被追踪到巴黎。

sentences.en: The Sunday flights will make a stopover in Paris.
sentences.cn: 周日的航班将中途经停巴黎。

sentences.en: The telegram will intercep him at Paris.
sentences.cn: 这封电报将把他截在巴黎。

sentences.en: Thereafter she wrote articles for papers and magazines in Paris.
sentences.cn: 此后她给巴黎的报纸和杂志撰稿。

sentences.en: They have invited me to go to Paris with them.
sentences.cn: 他们邀请我和他们一同去巴黎。

sentences.en: We have to change for Paris at this station.
sentences.cn: 我们必须在这个车站换车去巴黎。

sentences.en: We shall be landing in Paris in sixteen minutes, exactly on time.
sentences.cn: 我们将于16分钟后准时在巴黎降落。

sentences.en: Yes, first, and then to go to Paris.
sentences.cn: 是的，先是去结婚，然后还得到巴黎去一次。
